title: FACE Act of 2013
content: Forbidding Advertisement Through Child Exploitation Act of 2013 or the FACE Act of 2013 - Prohibits social media service providers from intentionally or knowingly using for a commercial purpose a self-image uploaded by a minor. Defines quot, social media servicequot. As any online service that allows an individual to upload, store, and manage personal content to share with other individuals. Requires violations to be treated as an unfair or deceptive act or practice under the Federal Trade Commission Act. Sets forth the enforcement authority of the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) and state attorneys general.
